Combining with neighbors?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: My Monster Rancher Archive (Andriod): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Combining with neighbors?
By I_EAT_DURT on Wednesday, February 22, 2012 - 05:52 pm:

I just started playing this today and I'm getting quite addicted. I was wondering how combining works with neighbors, if we both sacrifice a monster and both get one out of the process, or if it doesn't affect them at all if I choose to combine with one of theirs.

By tiakall on Thursday, February 23, 2012 - 05:46 pm:

You sacrifice yours, but the neighbor doesn't lose theirs, so neighbor-combine away! They will get a note on their history about the combining - I get a kick out of it.

By Seethru_Dark on Friday, March 9, 2012 - 07:02 am:

To add specific people you need to add them by their
mobage name first in mobage then look at your
nonagenarian friends in the contacts list in game to
neighbor them. Mine is Seethrudark add me if you want.
